summary: I’m a Front-end developer with a strong background in hospitality. I spent several years in leadership roles, where I gained valuable experience in team coordination, problem-solving, and delivering outstanding customer service. Now, I apply those strengths to build user-friendly, intuitive web applications. I’m excited to contribute to fast-paced, team-orientated projects and help create seamless digital experiences.

projects.name: Plan&Go
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Travel Planner
projects.description: Team project for Le Wagon bootcamp – Full-stack web application.
highlights: Implemented a dynamic, Mapbox-powered interactive map that allows users to search for locations and friends, with trip markers updating in real-time.
Collaborated on UX/UI design to create a clean, intuitive interface.
Helped build an AI-driven itinerary generator using OpenAI API for personalized day-by-day plans.

projects.name: PowerUp Marketplace
projects.subtitle: Team-built MVP
highlights: Built a marketplace MVP for fictional PowerUps with full CRUD features.
Contributed across the stack on features, styling, and data models.
Collaboratively designed UI components and wireframes in Figma.
Gained experience working in a fast-paced, team coding environment.

details: Built with confidence using Ruby on Rails and understood MVC pattern.
Worked with relational databases on real-world projects.
Created responsive UIs with HTML, CSS, SASS, and JavaScript.
Developed UX/UI skills through prototyping and feedback loops.
Covered full product cycle from back-end logic to deployment.

responsibilities: Improved performance of large React apps by reducing UI load times and fixing visual/data issues.
Assisted in migrating JavaScript to TypeScript and improving code structure.
Helped redesign UI elements for better accessibility and usability.
Worked on cross-browser testing and pushed accessibility scores from under 30% to over 90%.
Collaborated closely with senior developers and took initiative on high-volume work.
Stack: React, TypeScript, styled-components, HTML, CSS, Jest, Git, Figma.
Improved shift operations by identifying and solving bottlenecks.
Trained new staff to improve onboarding efficiency.
Gained leadership and communication skills applicable to tech team environments.
Led and motivated teams to ensure excellent service.
Monitored performance metrics and addressed issues quickly.
Maintained composure and team efficiency during peak times.
